body_html: This can happen if you build TensorFlow from source and answer "No" to the question "Do you wish to build TensorFlow with Google Cloud Platform support?". However you indicated that you installed a pre-built TensorFlow via pip install which should presumably have this option enabled. Adding @jhseu to help.
body_text: This can happen if you build TensorFlow from source and answer "No" to the question "Do you wish to build TensorFlow with Google Cloud Platform support?". However you indicated that you installed a pre-built TensorFlow via pip install which should presumably have this option enabled. Adding @jhseu to help.
body: This can happen if you build TensorFlow from source and answer "No" to the question "Do you wish to build TensorFlow with Google Cloud Platform support?". However you indicated that you installed a pre-built TensorFlow via `pip install` which should presumably have this option enabled. Adding @jhseu to help.
